New Records: Georgia reached the last 16 of the Euro 2024 tournament for the first time in their history
Key Match Events: Khvicha Kvaratskhelia scored in the first minute
Georges Mikautadze scored from the penalty spot in the 57th minute
Giorgi Mamardashvili made several key saves to keep a clean sheet
Pre-Game Insights: Georgia were considered underdogs against Portugal
Post-Match Reflections: Georgia's players and staff celebrated a historic win and a spot in the last 16
The team's goalkeeper, Giorgi Mamardashvili, was praised for his performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a significant upset for Portugal, who were considered favorites to win
Georgia's win was their first in the Euro 2024 tournament
The team's fans were ecstatic and celebrated the win with their players
Others: The match was marked by several substitutions and changes in tactics by both teams
The referee awarded a penalty to Georgia in the 57th minute, which was converted by Georges Mikautadze
